title: Banksy: Season's Greetings mural to leave Wales for England
description: The Season's Greetings mural, which appeared on a garage in 2018, will leave Port Talbot.

title: Wales v Australia: Josh Adams, Tomas Francis and Aaron Wainwright fit to face Wallabies
description: Wing Josh Adams, prop Tomas Francis and back row Aaron Wainwright are passed fit to start for Wales against Australia in Saturday's final autumn Test.

description: Zephaniah McLeod killed Jacob Billington in his deadly attack in Birmingham in September 2020.

description: Due to an eating disorder, a specific type of crisp is one of the few things Ava, four, will eat.

description: Six more former subpostmasters have their convictions overturned in the Horizon IT scandal.

title: Covid: Which children are being vaccinated and why?

description: The high-speed railway between London, the Midlands and North of England has been scaled back.
